data.text: @AbroadInnocents @PaulTonkinson @DeeringRob @RunComPod @bonfield_kevin @Progradar @parkrunUK Thank you. Still a tiny bit breathless but plan to do some more running this week which should help. It's the last crap on my chest and blocked nose every morning. Hopefully that will be gone soon.
@Bradfordgull @PaulTonkinson @DeeringRob @RunComPod @bonfield_kevin @Progradar @parkrunUK Good to see you feeling better.
@Progradar @PaulTonkinson @DeeringRob @RunComPod @bonfield_kevin @parkrunUK Thank you Martin. A good start on a return to fitness. Will take time but on a mission.

@bonfield_kevin @PaulTonkinson @DeeringRob @RunComPod @Progradar @parkrunUK Thank you Kevin. Bit slower than my last run of 26:20 there but considering I was having classic covid symptoms without being covid. Pcr and lateral flow negative. Had fatigue breathless etc. Pleased with the time. Just frustrating after getting over my achillies injury!
@Bradfordgull @PaulTonkinson @DeeringRob @RunComPod @Progradar @parkrunUK Great running Simon. Back in the game 👍🏃‍♂️
